metadata.title: CVE-2022-30045 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libezxml.a in ezXML 0.8.6. The functionezxml_decode() performs incorrect memory handling while parsing crafted XMLfiles, leading to a heap out-of-bounds read.

criterions.comment: netcdf package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
netcdf-parallel package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
scilab package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
mapcache package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
